techniqueDifficultyExplanation: The workout involves rowing with rhythm changes, which requires some coordination but remains accessible to those with basic rowing skills. The max rhythm of 28 indicates a moderate technical demand. Overall, this yields a technique difficulty of Beginner to Intermediate.
